duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform depot analytics and report generation for the Evolved SeaSparrow Missile (ESSM) program.
Manage integrated logistics support (ILS) activities and oversee depot repair and return management.
Generate and maintain the Consolidated Maintenance Status Report (CMSR) for the program.
Partner with customers and engineering management to support Life Cycle Engineering tasks related to depot metrics generation and ILS activities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Supply Chain, or related field (Advanced degree preferred)
